channel.title: Comments on: Cold War PS5 Ray Tracing Disabled and 120HZ how to fix? My monitor is 1080P 144HZ and i use the original PS5 HDMI cable.
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: xraystan
item.dc:creator: xraystan
item.description:
What is the problem you are having?
You can't have both ray tracing and 120hz mode enabled in CW, it's one or the other.
If you want ray tracing you have to take your PS5 out of performance mode.
item.content:encoded:
What is the problem you are having?

You can’t have both ray tracing and 120hz mode enabled in CW, it’s one or the other.

If you want ray tracing you have to take your PS5 out of performance mode.

item.title: By: yungferrari
item.dc:creator: yungferrari
item.description: You need to enable performance mode in the settings of your ps5, had the same problem
item.content:encoded: You need to enable performance mode in the settings of your ps5, had the same problem

item.title: By: Bigstinkyfeett
item.dc:creator: Bigstinkyfeett
item.description: Performance mode is enabled, my monitor is a Phillips 242E1GAEZ-Full HD gaming monitor.
item.content:encoded: Performance mode is enabled, my monitor is a Phillips 242E1GAEZ-Full HD gaming monitor.

item.title: By: Mr-Boogeyman420
item.dc:creator: Mr-Boogeyman420
item.description: Check your monitor specs. It probably only does 144hrz with Display port.
item.content:encoded: Check your monitor specs. It probably only does 144hrz with Display port.

item.title: By: francovilar
item.dc:creator: francovilar
item.description: 120hz is enabled. You can’t have ray tracing and 120hz at the same time. If you want ray tracing disable performance mode
item.content:encoded: 120hz is enabled. You can’t have ray tracing and 120hz at the same time. If you want ray tracing disable performance mode

item.title: By: FitSwimming2433
item.dc:creator: FitSwimming2433
item.description: Get a new controller probably broken
